LocaleResource.Name: Fields.Products.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The comma-separated list of product identifiers (e.g. 77, 123, 156). You can find a product ID on its details page. You can also specify the comma-separated list of product identifiers with quantities ({Product ID}:{Quantity}. for example, 77:1, 123:2, 156:3). And you can also specify the comma-separated list of product identifiers with quantity range ({Product ID}:{Min quantity}-{Max quantity}. for example, 77:1-3, 123:2-5, 156:3-8).
